name: admin.toml

role.name: Administrator
role.description: Administrator with full access to all resources

rawContent:
# Admin Role

[role]
id = "admin"
name = "Administrator"
description = "Administrator with full access to all resources"
level = 2

[permissions]
list = [
  "view:docs",
  "view:prototype",
  "edit:profile",
  "manage:users",
  "manage:settings"
]
